docs.title: Volunteers Required
docs.text: Need contributions to add content to this landing page. You can be imaginative and even wild with this. Here's something typical that goes on in pages like these. But we can add anything here.

docs.title: Hello from Anarkitties
docs.text:
We are a group of libertarian socialists based out of India. Feel free to explore the resources. (Need to add more content here).

You can contact us on bla,bla,bla if you're a fellow anarchist or believe in libertarian politics.

docs.title: How to navigate this site?
docs.text:
• Use the side-bar on the left to navigate the sections. The right sidebar shows the contents of thats section.
  • You can also use the search if you're looking for something specific.

docs.title: Anarchism 101 texts
docs.text:
1. Anarchism : From Theory to Practice by Daniel Geurin
  2. Means and Ends by Zoe Baker. Here's the direct PDF Link
  3. Statism and Anarchy by Bakunin
  4. An Appeal to the Young by Kropotkin

docs.title: Anarchist critique of the state
docs.text: 1. A very short article - Means and Ends: The Anarchist Critique of Seizing State Power by Zoe Baker. It also has a video version here

docs.title: Marxism 101
docs.text:
1. The Communist Manifesto - By Marx & Engels
  2. A summary of Marx's capital (approved by Marx himself) : Compendium of Karl Marx's Capital by Carlo Cafiero
  3. An Anthropology of Marxism by Cedric J.Robinson. Checkout the direct PDF link.

docs.title: Marxism
docs.text:
1. Wage, Labour and Capital by Marx. Download PDF from here.
  2. Value, Price and Profit. Download PDF from here

docs.title: On USSR & Leninism
docs.text:
1. State capitalism and World revolution by CLR james
  2. Labor discipline and decline in soviet system by Donald Filtzer

  3. Bloodstained: One Hundred Years of Leninist Counterrevolution - Barry Pateman and Iain McKay. Here's a direct PDF link.

    Here's a chapter from the same anthology: The State and Revolution - Theory and Practice by Iain Mckay

  4. A four part video essay by Anark: The State is Counter Revolutionary (part1)

  5. Soviet Workers and Late Stalinism by Donald Filtzer. Here's a direct download link.
  6. What was the USSR? - Aufheben
  7. Soviet Marxism: A Critical Analysis by Herbert Marcuse
  8. My Disillusionment in Russia by Emma Goldman

docs.title: Praxis content
docs.text: Content yet to be added. Checkout Anarchism 101 or Critique of leninism & USSR for now.
